text: "Runaround Sue" is a 1961 song by Dion and is the title track from his debut studio album Runaround Sue. It went to number 1 in the United States, New Zealand and Canada and number 2 in Australia. It was covered by Del Shannon and Leif Garrett in 1977. ==References== Category:1961 songs Category:Pop songs Category:Doo-wop songs Category:Dion DiMucci songs Category:Leif Garrett songs Category:Del Shannon songs
title: Runaround Sue
